com.st.st25sdk

Interface SectorInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LRiS64KTag, M24LR04KTag, M24LR16KTag, M24LR64KTag, STType5Sector, STVicinityTag

    public interface SectorInterface
    Interface specific to Tags supporting several memory areas

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getNumberOfSectors

        int getNumberOfSectors()

      • getNumberOfBlocksPerSector

      • getSecurityStatus

        byte getSecurityStatus(int sector)
                throws STException
        Ask for the security status of the sector
        Parameters:
        sector -
        Returns:
        a byte according datasheet specs: b7:0 b6:0 b5:0 b4,b3 Pwd bits, b2/b1: r/w protection bits b0: sector lock
        Throws:
        STException

      • getSecurityStatus

        byte[] getSecurityStatus()
                  throws STException
        Throws:
        STException

      • setSecurityStatus

        void setSecurityStatus(int sector,
                       byte value)
                throws STException
        Parameters:
        sector -
        value: - b7:0 b6:0 b5:0 b4,b3 Pwd bits, b2/b1: r/w protection bits b0: sector lock
        Throws:
        STException
